products.title: Splash Flamingo Pink Panel Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Flamingo Pink Panel Blind in Pink. Made to measure from £36.61 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Panel Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our moisture-resistant Splash Flamingo Pink panel blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space.  The bold pink panel is a beautiful, contemporary colour which will brighten, and enrich the space with its warm, saturated shade. 
 
As panel blinds reach a massive 5 metres width and 3,.5 metres drop, this makes it one of the largest blinds we make.  A popular blind for large windows and doors, or as a modern room-divider, this blind is not only durable but versatile by design. 
 
Panel blinds add a really modern feel to any space and at Swift Direct Blinds, when purchasing this blind you will also be able to take advantage of our free 5 year guarantee, which means investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.  
 
 Product ID: DB-PAN0273 Fabric Colour: Flamingo Pink Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: White Aluminium 5 channel track     Control Type: Cord or Wand Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Splash Lipstick Pink Panel Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Lipstick Pink Panel Blind in Pink. Made to measure from £36.61 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Panel Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our moisture-resistant, Splash lipstick pink panel blinds are a fabulous way to dress your large window.  The bold pink shade, adds flair and saturated colour which can make for a dramatic finish to your room. As our panel blinds are available at 5 metres width and 3 metres drop, panel blinds are a great way to divide a large room or to dress a large window. 
 
Panel blinds are perfect for patio doors & are available with a various control & stacking options, including a wand control making them inherently child safe.  As they are a made to measure product, they are covered with our 5 year guarantee giving extra peace of mind when investing in this product.
 
 Product ID: DB-PAN0220 Fabric Colour: Lipstick Pink Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: White Aluminium 5 channel track     Control Type: Cord or Wand Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Splash Blush Pink Panel Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Blush Pink Panel Blind in Pink. Made to measure from £36.61 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Panel Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Splash Blush Pink Panel blinds are a fabulous way to dress your window.  The light pink fabric is a contemporary and stylish colour choice for any living space.  
 
Panel blinds are perfect for patio doors & are available with various control & stacking options, including a wand control making them inherently child safe.  
 
At Swift Direct Blinds, like all our made to measure products, these panel blinds are covered with our 5 year guarantee giving you that extra peace of mind when purchasing.  
 
 Product ID: DB-PAN0249 Fabric Colour: Blush Pink Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: White Aluminium 5 channel track     Control Type: Cord or Wand Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Splash Hint
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Splash Hint Standard Panel Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Standard Panel Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Min Width: 600mm Max Width: 5000mm
 	Min Drop: 450mm Max Drop: 3500mm
 	Composition: Polyester
 	Guarantee: 12 Months
 	Stack: A choice of left, right or split.
 	Controls: Wand control attached to lead panel(s) to manually pull panels across.
 	Headrail: Robust white aluminium track, track depth varies depending on number of panels required.
 	Fixings: Top fix or face fix brackets.
